ygData.subject: SK only weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: How about an SK only weapon, equivilent to the ghoulsbane? roughly dmg 15 delay 35 stats if one hand or dmg 20 delary 50 if two handed. The effect would be one
ygData.messageBody:
How about an SK only weapon, equivilent to the ghoulsbane?
roughly dmg 15 delay 35 stats if one hand
or dmg 20 delary 50 if two handed.

The effect would be one of the lifetap line spells that does 70 to 100.
Slightly lower then the GB since it is a lifetap and can be used on
anything.

The way this would benefit the human and DE Sk's is becuase of their high
base DEX rating to the troll and ogre SK's. this would result in them
getting more weapon procs from it

Inosolan Braveheart
Human SK 43
Veeshan
